name: angular-sailsjs-boilerplate
description: Example boilerplate application for AngularJS + Sails.js with separated back- and frontend.

scripts.install: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: (cd backend && sails lift) & (cd frontend && gulp serve)
